packages.name: virtualbox
packages.cmd: sudo sh -c 'wget -O- https://www.virtualbox.org/download/oracle_vbox_2016.asc | gpg --yes --output /usr/share/keyrings/oracle-virtualbox-2016.gpg --dearmor' && echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/oracle-virtualbox-2016.gpg] http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/debian $(lsb_release -sc) contrib" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/virtualbox.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y virtualbox-7.1 && sudo usermod -aG vboxusers $USER
